title: Himi 490
lyrics:
11.10.11.10.
(Ko e ‘Alo’i)
1.
Kau tauhi manu mohe he toafa.
Le’ohi ‘enau fanga sipi ē,
Kae fokifā na’e ulo mai ha maama,
‘O lofa hifo ha fu’u hōsitē.
Ko e kau ‘āngelo
Haʻu mei he langi
Ke fakamelo
‘A e Tu’i ‘o māmani.
2.
Mo’u tāfu’ua honau loto ia,
He ava hifo he Ta’ehamai ē
Kae tala,”’Oua te mou ilifia;
Kae kehe mou mavava fulipē.”
Ko e kau ‘āngelo etc.
3.
“He ko e tala fakafiefia
Kuo mau omi hono fakahā,
Kuo ‘alo’i mai homou Misaia,
Te Ne kilala hake ‘a e Tangata.”
Ko e kau ‘āngelo etc.
4.
Pā ange ai ‘a e tali ‘a e kau hiva
‘Enau a’au ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua;
Pēteliake, tu’i, palōfita
Nau lau monū ka hoko he fonua.
Ko e kau ‘āngelo etc.
5.
Fai foki ē, kau ‘āngelo ‘o langi,
‘O fakamelo ‘ene toe ha’u;
Māmani kuo fonu he mamahi,
‘E fakakū nai ‘a e lelei na’e lau?
Ko e kau ‘āngelo etc.*
